org.apache.hadoop.yarn.webapp

类 Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.yarn.webapp.Controller
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Params
    直接已知子类:
    HelloWorld.Hello, MyApp.MyController

    @InterfaceAudience.LimitedPrivate(value={"YARN","MapReduce"})
public abstract class Controller
extends Object
implements Params
